    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v0

    Facet Offer_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v0:Offer_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v0:Offer_Summary

      • Description

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Offer xmlns:prod="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/v0" offerId="offer_1" vendor="I am a tiny string." xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v0">
    <Price currencyCode="USD" decimalPlaces="2">80000</Price>
    <TermsAndConditions duration="1234" id="termsAndConditions_1"/>
    <TermsAndConditions duration="2345" id="termsAndConditions_2"/>
    <TermsAndConditions duration="3456" id="termsAndConditions_3"/>
    <prod:ProductID>
        <prod:Identifier company="Acme" instance="i0987654321" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</prod:Identifier>
    </prod:ProductID>
    <prod:ProductID>
        <prod:Identifier company="Acme" instance="i0987654321" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</prod:Identifier>
    </prod:ProductID>
    <prod:ProductID>
        <prod:Identifier company="Acme" instance="i0987654321" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</prod:Identifier>
    </prod:ProductID>
</Offer>

      Example JSON

      {
  "OfferSummary" : {
    "@type" : "Offer",
    "offerId" : "offer_1",
    "vendor" : "I am a tiny string.",
    "Price" : {
      "value" : 80000.0,
      "currencyCode" : "USD",
      "decimalPlaces" : 2
    },
    "TermsAndConditions" : [ {
      "@type" : "TermsAndConditions",
      "id" : "termsAndConditions_1",
      "duration" : 1234
    }, {
      "@type" : "TermsAndConditions",
      "id" : "termsAndConditions_2",
      "duration" : 2345
    }, {
      "@type" : "TermsAndConditions",
      "id" : "termsAndConditions_3",
      "duration" : 3456
    } ],
    "Product" : [ {
      "@type" : "ProductID",
      "Identifier" : {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "company" : "Acme",
        "instance" : "i0987654321"
      }
    }, {
      "@type" : "ProductID",
      "Identifier" : {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "company" : "Acme",
        "instance" : "i0987654321"
      }
    }, {
      "@type" : "ProductID",
      "Identifier" : {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "company" : "Acme",
        "instance" : "i0987654321"
      }
    } ]
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Price
        Total price for all the products. Price may include itemized price information
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:Currency_Amount
        Example Value 80000
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        TermsAndConditions
        Specifies the terms and conditions for this offer.
        Details
        Type TermsAndConditions
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 25
        Product
        One or more products that make up this offer.
        Details
        Type Product
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 30

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        vendor
        Specifies the vendor for this offer.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String_Tiny
        Example Value I am a tiny string.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
